title: Volkswagen India to offer 6 airbags across all variants Taigun and Virtus models
description: Volkswagen India announced that all variants of its Taigun and Virtus models, both rated 5-Stars by Global NCAP for safety, will now come equipped with six airbags. This move is part of Volkswagen's ongoing efforts to enhance its product offerings since the launch of its India 2.0 portfolio. The Taigun, a subcompact crossover SUV, debuted in September 2021, while the Virtus, a mid-sized sedan, was introduced in March 2022.
